    • makeGameLevel

      private static Brick[] makeGameLevel​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCnt, int lineCnt, double brickSizeRatio, int typeA, int typeB)
      makeGameLevel will create the look of the game level
      Parameters:
      drawArea - dimension of the brick
      brickCnt - stores the brick count
      lineCnt - stores the line count
      brickSizeRatio - ratio of brick size
      typeA - brick type A
      typeB - brick type B
      Returns:
      the brick

    • makeLevels

      public static Brick[][] makeLevels​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio)
      makeLevels make the playable levels in the game
      Parameters:
      drawArea - dimension of brick
      brickCount - stores the brick count
      lineCount - stores line count
      brickDimensionRatio - the ratio of the brick's dimension
      Returns:
      array of bricks forming the brick wall
